listitem.para: Erases (deletes, removes) the file named filename. The file must not be currently be open.

listitem.programlisting:
OPENWRITE "dummy.fil SETWRITE "dummy.fil PRINT "Hello SETWRITE [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
OPENREAD "dummy.fil CLOSE "dummy.fil
ERASEFILE "dummy.fil OPENREAD "dummy.fil File system error: I can't open that file
